alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gilmer; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, southwestern Gilmer, west central Braxton, eastern Roane and northwestern Clay Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Arnoldsburg, or 7 miles northeast of Spencer, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Otter, Arnoldsburg, Wallback, Nebo, Millstone, Orma, Tariff, Nicut, Mount Zion, Annamoriah, and Chloe. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 30 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
